sql-select.name: GetUnnamedConstraints
Unnamed Constraints
sql-select.description: Find all constraints with SQL Server default names.
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSU.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSOParent.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSOParent.[xtype] AS [ObjectType] ,tSOParent.[crdate] AS [ObjectCreateDate] ,tSC.[name] AS [ObjectConstraintColumnName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ConstraintName] ,CASE WHEN tSCC.[status] & 5 = 5 THEN N'DEFAULT_CONSTRAINT' WHEN tSCC.[status] & 4 = 4 THEN N'CHECK_CONSTRAINT' WHEN tSCC.[status] & 3 = 3 THEN N'FOREIGN_KEY_CONSTRAINT' WHEN tSCC.[status] & 2 = 2 THEN N'UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT' WHEN tSCC.[status] & 1 = 1 THEN N'PRIMARY_KEY_CONSTRAINT' ELSE N'' END AS [ConstraintType] ,tSCOMM.[text] AS [ConstraintDefinition] FROM [dbo].[sysconstraints] tSCC INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysobjects] tSOParent ON tSOParent.[id] = tSCC.[id] INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO ON tSO.[id] = tSCC.[constid] INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSU ON tSU.[uid] = tSO.[uid] INNER JOIN [dbo].[syscolumns] tSC ON tSC.[id] = tSOParent.[id] AND tSC.[colid] = tSCC.[colID] INNER JOIN [dbo].[syscomments] tSCOMM ON tSCOMM.[id] = tSCC.[constid] WHERE tSOParent.[xtype] IN ( N'U' ) AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSOParent.[id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND tSO.[name] LIKE N'%[_][0-9a-f][0-9a-f][0-9a-f][0-9a-f][0-9a-f][0-9a-f][0-9a-f][0-9a-f]' GROUP BY tSU.[name] ,tSOParent.[name] ,tSOParent.[xtype] ,tSOParent.[crdate] ,tSC.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSCC.[status] ,tSCOMM.[text] ORDER BY tSU.[name] ,tSOParent.[name] ;
